title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

section_1.title: Information We Collect
section_1.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we gather automatically when you use our services.

section_2.title: How We Use Your Information
section_2.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

purposes.service_provision: To provide and maintain our AI automation services
purposes.customer_support: To provide customer support and respond to inquiries
purposes.communication: To send important updates and marketing communications
purposes.improvements: To improve our services and develop new features
purposes.legal_compliance: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

section_3.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
section_3.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

cases.service_providers: With trusted service providers who assist in our operations
cases.legal_requirements: When required by law or to protect our legal rights
cases.business_transfer: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
cases.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

section_4.title: Data Security
section_4.intro: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:

measures.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
measures.regular_audits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
measures.staff_training: Employee training on data protection practices

section_5.title: Your Rights and Choices
section_5.intro: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

rights.objection: Objection to processing for marketing purposes

section_6.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
